title: Tyrion Lannister Q&A
description:
Three hours of discussion about Tyrion Lannister!

Watch the Tyrion video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H9HFigfkKHA

Watch this podcast episode with visuals on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tCrGgD39Mys

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/77vubQGd6CsuespWT2Wqa0

Rate on Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/podcast/alt-shift-podcast/id1467112355

Twitter: https://twitter.com/AltShiftX

Original livestream: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TOWpR4X-mJQ

Special thanks to Patrons Cameron Weiss, Michael Appell, Ryan Steele, Harry, Shane Veglia, Brian Sentient, Ria McDoodle, Tim Cunniff, NotGac, Cara Akame, Ilhuilkamina Urdiana, Gareth, T. Ledoux.
